description:
Experience 72H reliable anti-perspirant protection and unique skin comfort with NIVEA MEN Intense Protection Fresh Anti-Perspirant Roll-On Deodorant. The dual protect formula has two antibacterial actives and 0% alcohol, providing you with a long-lasting dry and comfortable feeling.

NIVEA MEN Intense Protection Fresh Anti-Perspirant offers you 72H reliable anti-perspirant protection with unique skin comfort. The effective dual protect formula with two antibacterial actives keeps your armpits dry and prevents malodour. At the same time, this skin-friendly formula with 0% alcohol supports a comfortable skin feeling. The unique dry and comfortable skin feeling is accompanied by a fresh masculine fragrance. Designed for men who want maximum protection with a fresh masculine fragrance and without any compromises. Its skin tolerance has been dermatologically proven.

Lasting Protection: 72H anti-perspirant protection

Quality Ingredients: Dual Protect formula with two antibacterial actives

Effective Formula: quick drying for your comfort

Caring Effect: protection from sweat and bacteria

Skin Safe: No Ethyl Alcohol

Suitable for all skin types: Skin tolerance dermatologically proven
name: Nivea Men Intense Protection Fresh 72h Anti Perspirant Roll On 50ml
